Description: Position Title:        Sous ChefEmployment Type: Full-timeSalary:         up to 12K AED, all-inclusive depending on experience and qualifications plus tips and service chargeJob Location:         Dubai, UAEAbout the Client: An international French fine dining restaurant in DubaiJob Description:  Assist in overseeing kitchen operations, ensuring efficiency and adherence to quality standards. Demonstrate strong culinary skills in food preparation and presentation Work with the Head Chef to create and update menu offerings. Maintain food quality and consistency through regular checks Train and mentor kitchen staff, fostering a positive work environment.Skills
Skills:  At least 3 years’ experience in the similar role
 French cuisine and high end / fine dining experience is a must
